s: Lyrically Correct is a head to head trivia game to see who really remembers the lyrics to some of your favorite songs. Are you ready to turn up at your game night? Be prepared to rap your favorite rhyme or sing your favorite R&B line. Grab two or more players (pick your teammates wisely) and take turns answering questions about the ’90s and 2000’s Hip Hop and R&B hits. ...
